settings.subtitle: HOW IT WORKS
settings.title: This is a Catchy heading, It’s got more to say

settings.question: How do I get started building my Gift Registry?
settings.answer:
Login or create an account here.

Click Create Registry link (this link changes to “Gift Registry” when you have created a Registry)

settings.question: How do I add products to my Gift Registry?
settings.answer: Use the Gift icon to add items to the registry. Gifts can be added from any collection page, or from any product page.

settings.question: When is the best time to set up my Gift Registry?
settings.answer: Start setting up when it suits you! We recommend sending your Gift Registry to your friends and family 4-6 weeks prior to the date you'd like to receive everything. It's always a good idea to send a confirmation reminder to your friends and family the week before your event, as we all know those people who love a last minute shop!

settings.question: Can someone help me navigate what I should select for my Gift Registry?
settings.answer: Absolutely, book your 1:1 Virtual Consulthereand tell us when suits you for a call.

settings.heading: Build your registry
